txt.en: Wanted: Huge heartwood from the snow-lurkers throughout the Bruinen Source. \n\nThe dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of huge heartwood.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
The dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of huge heartwood.
Collection boxes for this task can be found at the camps within the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
Wanted: Huge heartwood from the snow-lurkers throughout the Bruinen Source.
Collect huge heartwood and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
